summary: A reconstruction of the Battle of Culloden, the last battle to take place on British soil, as if modern TV cameras were present.
cast: Tony Cosgrove|Olivier Espitalier-Noel|Don Fairservice|George McBean|Robert Oates|Patrick Watkins|Peter Watkins
keywords: one word title|place name in title|scotland|english scottish conflict|interview
title: Culloden
